text: Tomáš Kaberle (born March 2, 1978 in Rakovník, Czechoslovakia) is a former professional Czech ice hockey defenceman that played for the Montreal Canadiens of the National Hockey League (NHL). He also played for the Toronto Maple Leafs from 1998 to 2011, the Boston Bruins in 2011 and the Carolina Hurricanes in 2011. He was drafted by the Toronto Maple Leafs with the 204th overall pick in the 2003 NHL Draft. He played in the Czech Extraliga for the HC Kladno where he played four seasons. He won the Stanley Cup with the Bruins on June 15, 2011 when the Bruins defeated the Vancouver Canucks in game 7 by a score of 4-0. ==Other websites== * Tomáš Kaberle at NHL.com Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Czech ice hockey players Category:Boston Bruins players Category:Carolina Hurricanes players Category:Hartford Wolf Pack players Category:Montreal Canadiens players Category:Stanley Cup champions Category:St. John's Maple Leafs players Category:Toronto Maple Leafs players Category:Ice hockey defencemen
title: Tomáš Kaberle
